org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.java.reverse.javaparser.ast.comments

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.java.reverse.javaparser.ast.Node

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockComment, JavadocComment, LineComment

    public abstract class Comment
extends Node
    Abstract class for all AST nodes that represent comments.
    Author:
    Julio Vilmar Gesser
    See Also:
    BlockComment, LineComment, JavadocComment
